column1: I would like to say in the final scene of the newest episode of Game of Thrones there was a Les Miserables reference (Look Down!) as well as Dark Knight reference (Let her go). All I thought was “Poor choice of words” like I was the Joker.
when all my favourite characters keep dying
What kills me everytime about someone I’m attracted to is their voice.
all i’ve been doing in my free time for the past 2 weeks is watch game of thrones and now i’m caught up and i literally don’t know what to do with myself
